subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yoichi Terada is more than a trainer for Mets pitcher Hisanori Takahashi: he’s also his interpreter, massage therapist, cook, cleaner and driver.
snippet: Yoichi Terada is more than a trainer for Mets pitcher Hisanori Takahashi: he’s also his interpreter, massage therapist, cook, cleaner and driver.
